Name: Oestersoe Cola
Ingredients: 20 ml Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Fruit and balanced rather than sweet or dry and with a subtle but interesting liquorice note.
History: Our thanks to Joel Savard for sending us this drink which he discovered in 2014 at Copenhagen's Lidkoeb (Lidkøb) cocktail bar. This drink's name, Østersø Cola, translates as Baltic Cola.
Nutrition: One serving of Oestersoe Cola contains 204 calories
